message.content:
cs.NI, cs.LG, cs.SY, cs.CV, cs.RO

This paper primarily focuses on the development of a system for indoor localization and proximity detection using iBeacons. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper proposes algorithms for improving the accuracy of proximity detection and indoor localization, which involves machine learning and statistical analysis. Hence, it could also be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.SY (Systems and Control), and cs.CV (Computer Vision). Finally, the paper also discusses the use of robotics for testing the proposed system, which could potentially fall under cs.RO (Robotics).
